name: Woken Up In Wotherspuns
description:
CW: Alcohol

You have woken up after a heavy night in a Wotherspuns, a very British non-place (it's a chain of pubs, like the one you're thinking of but different enough for me not to be sued). Using situational clues such as local beers and abandoned newspapers, work out which specific pub you're in.

Made in Unity, written in Inky.
